description.english: Reach Zone 2.
Reach Zone 3.
Reach Zone 4.
Defeat the Final Boss.
Loop the game.
Destroy a bunch of vehicles.
Try out 100 Upgrades.
Land a bunch of chain destructions.
Reach rank R.
Upgrade all stats to 5 stars in a single run.
Buy out the entire shop.
Destroy a Boss in either one hit or within 1 second of your first hit.
Have 3 Turbos active at the same time.
Defeat the Final Boss after looping.
Destroy a bunch of taunted enemies.
Unstun a bunch of enemies by taunting.
Visit every area.
Defeat the Final Boss without having acquired any upgrades.
Defeat the Final Boss without having used your base attack in the entire run.
Reach Zone 4 without having destroyed any bosses
Finish several levels without letting an enemy leave the level before you in a single run.
Defeat the Final Boss without taking more than 300 damage in the entire run by enemies.
Reach the Final Boss while boosting for more than 50% of the run.
Defeat the Final Boss with a modifier active.
Defeat the Final Boss with an alternative Slam Type active.
Have a bunch of charged upgrade effects active at the same time.
As John Carma, defeat the Final Boss with only speed or boost related upgrades.
As John Carma, destroy a bunch of vehicles with over 100 HP using the Spin Attack.
As John Carma, hit 2 vehicles while performing a Boost Jump 10 times.
As John Carma, destroy vehicles by making them drive into the Spin Attack.
As Deadlift, hit a bunch of vehicles with thrown vehicles.
As Deadlift, land 10 triple Chain Destructions with thrown vehicles.
As Deadlift, throw a bunch of vehicles with over 100 HP.
As Deadlift, defeat the Final Boss without any health, weight or damage-reducing related upgrades.
As Mr. Kill, detonate a bunch of vehicles at once using Pipebombs.
As Mr. Kill, perform Blast Jumps using Pipebombs.
As Mr. Kill, destroy a Boss with a directly attached Pipebomb.
As Mr. Kill, attach Pipebombs to non-civilians.
As M.A.L.L, destroy a bunch of vehicles with a single use of SUPER HONK multiple times.
As M.A.L.L, deal over 100 damage by ramming into vehicles multiple times.
As M.A.L.L, quickly destroy vehicles with >100HP using Slam and SUPER HONK.
As M.A.L.L, defeat the Final Boss without any Speed or Boost related upgrades.
As Abe, Rocket Jump off vehicles.
As Abe, destroy a bunch of vehicles with a single rocket multiple times.
As Abe, destroy vehicles shortly after Rocket Jumping.
As Abe, perform a max power Boost Jump immediately after Rocket Jumping.
As Big Tuna, destroy vehicles shortly after harpoon release.
As Big Tuna, obtain two upgrades that increase your push movement.
As Big Tuna, spend some time attached.
As Big Tuna, destroy vehicles using the Slam while attached.
As Sean & Heyo, turn corners by switching.
As Sean & Heyo, destroy vehicles during active Switch Turbos.
As Sean & Heyo, flip vehicles.
As Sean & Heyo, defeat the Final Boss without any turning related upgrades.
As Sword Van, destroy vehicles with a single sword slash multiple times.
As Sword Van, destroy vehicles outside slash range by thrusting.
As Sword Van, destroy vehicles behind you.
As Sword Van, defeat a boss in an honorable duel.
As Shopkeep, hit the JACKPOT.
As Shopkeep, gamble 7 times in 7 seconds.
As Shopkeep, defeat the Final Boss without upgrading any of your stats.
As Shopkeep, destroy vehicles using Slot Effects.
Unlock Mr. Kill.
Unlock M.A.L.L
Unlock Abe.
Unlock Big Tuna.
Unlock Sean & Heyo.

displayName.english: OBVIOUSLY A CODENAME OF SOME SORT
